title: Episode 280: The End of the Experiment in Unlimited Government
itunes:title: The End of the Experiment in Unlimited Government
description:
For one-hundred years, the United States has been conducting an experiment in unlimited government wherein politicians spend far beyond the government’s means, kicking the fiscal can down the road for future generations to pay. The future has finally arrived and we are that future generation. The inflation we’re experiencing now is the beginning of the price we’ll be paying for a century of unlimited government.

Get Your Copy of Cooperation and Coercion Now!

http://www.cooperationandcoercion.com

Show Your Support for Words & Numbers at Patreon

https://www.patreon.com/wordsandnumbers

https://www.sightline.org/2014/09/29/zoning-inclusionary-v-exclusionary/

https://dailytravelpill.com/montane-mansion-hong-kong-monster-building/

https://news.yahoo.com/affordable-housing-california-now-routinely-120027201.html

 

Foolishness of the Week

https://www.cnbc.com/2022/06/19/holiday-weekend-sees-massive-amount-of-flight-cancellations.html

 

Topic of the Week
